document.ModsDocTitle: New records of Trichoceridae (Diptera) from the island of Mallorca ​
document.masterDocTitle: New records of Trichoceridae (Diptera) from the island of Mallorca

subSubSection.paragraph: Specimens of T. saltator from Mallorca have around 30 setae on the ventral side of Sc vein, which is a case similarly observed in males of T. pappi Krzeminska, 2003 from Morocco ( Driauach et al. 2015 ). However, in other characters the Mallorcan specimens agree with T. saltator , including wing venation not typical for T. pappi and the species-specific male gonocoxal bridge and aedeagal complex (Fig. 3 A, B, D).
